BAD_REQUEST.errorDesc: The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error.

UNAUTHORIZED.errorDesc: The user does not have valid authentication credentials for the target resource.

FORBIDDEN.errorDesc: The user might not have the necessary permissions for a resource, or may need an account of some sort.

NOT_FOUND.errorDesc: The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future.

REQUEST_TIMEOUT.errorDesc: The server timed out waiting for the request.

GATEWAY_TIMEOUT.errorDesc: A network error between servers on the internet or an issue with an actual server

UNKNOWN_ERROR.errorDesc: A network error between servers on the internet or an issue with an actual server

INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR.errorDesc: The server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request
